info.author: Izak Burger, Syslab.com GmbH
info.description:
Introduction
============

slc.mailrouter bridges the gap between zope and email. It is based on the same
idea as products such as mailboxer: a script is invoked by your mail transfer
agent (postfix, exim) and the body of the email is passed to this script on
stdin. This is then communicate to zope using an http post, where it is parsed
and handled.

This package implements the smtp2zope script.
info.name: slc.smtp2zope
info.summary: Provides smtp2zope integration script for slc.mailrouter.
info.html_description:
slc.mailrouter bridges the gap between zope and email. It is based on the same idea as products such as mailboxer: a script is invoked by your mail transfer agent (postfix, exim) and the body of the email is passed to this script on stdin. This is then communicate to zope using an http post, where it is parsed and handled.

This package implements the smtp2zope script.
